奥巴马是在为“华人不能和白人结婚道歉”不让中国人入境，不需要道歉

On June 18, 2012, the United States House of Representatives passed H.Res. 683, a resolution which had been introduced by Congresswoman Judy Chu, that formally expresses the regret of the House of Representatives for the Chinese Exclusion Act, an act which imposed almost total restrictions on Chinese immigration and naturalization and denied Chinese-Americans basic freedoms because of their ethnicity.
道歉涉及的是移民,归化和自由. 限制白人和非白人结婚是另一条法律废止的.
